title: CSS
content: CSS is a lightweight and user-friendly web framework for Python, designed to simplify web application development. It offers a minimalistic approach, allowing developers to have more control and flexibility in building web applications. With its easy-to-use routing system, built-in template engine (Jinja2), and a wide range of extensions, Flask is well-suited for creating web applications and RESTful APIs. Its modular design philosophy encourages organization and scalability while also supporting URL building and serving as a solid foundation for smaller to medium-sized projects. Flask's active community and extensive documentation make it an excellent choice for beginners and experienced developers looking for a straightforward and customizable solution for web development in Python.
author: Harry vai
